title: EXECUTIVE Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Executive watch face for android Wear
description: Your life in time with this modern and classy piece of smart watch making. This analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic timepieces and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design. Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)★ 24h Analog Dial★ Watch Battey Dial★ Smartphone Battery Dial★ Customizable text logos and background color (via companion app)★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)★ Date, day ★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain ★  Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo- A special thanks to Atom23 who support us debugging graphical components
descriptionHTML:
Your life in time with this modern and classy piece of smart watch making. This analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic timepieces and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)
★ 24h Analog Dial
★ Watch Battey Dial
★ Smartphone Battery Dial
★ Customizable text logos and background color (via companion app)
★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)
★ Date, day
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view
More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo

- A special thanks to Atom23 who support us debugging graphical components
comments: Please remove seconds dial from ambient mode, then it'll be perfect.
